channel.description: Recent content in Publications on Timm Lichte

item.title: Publications
item.description: The used citations style is the Unified Style Sheet for Linguistics. \(\rightarrow\) CSL, BibLaTeX, support for Jabref and Papercite 2019 Lichte, Timm, Simon Petitjean, Agata Savary & Jakub Waszczuk. 2019. Lexical encoding formats for multi-word expressions: The challenge of “irregular” regularities. In Yannick Parmentier & Jakub Waszczuk (eds.), Representation and parsing of multiword expressions: Current trends (Phraseology and Multiword Expressions 3), 1–33. Berlin: Language Science Press. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.2579033. Savary, Agata, Silvio Ricardo Cordeiro, Timm Lichte, Carlos Ramisch, Uxoa Iñurrieta & Voula Giouli.
